definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: spider (Targum [[עַכּוּבִיתָא]], [[עַכָּבִיתָא]]; whence Ar. 9ankabuwtun as loan-wd.; NH [[עַכְשׁוּב]] prob. tarantula, acc. to Levy:NHWB iii.648);—´[[בֵּית ע]] Job 8:14 i.e. web, so prob. Job 27:18 (rdg. ´[[ע]] for MT [[עָשׁ]]); cf. ´[[קוּרֵי ע]] Is 59:5 filaments of a spider.
